Dialogs.Dialog: Hah... It's really good to be able to relax on New Year's.
小早川
Hehe... How about your New Year resolution？
Hmm... I'll think about it leisurely.
Then you can have the same resolution as Rinko's, okay？
The same？ What's your resolution then？
That's... I can't tell anyone about it.
？ Then I won't even know what I should aim for.
It's fine！ You don't have to know！ ...You're such an idiot！
(What's with her...？)
February reminds me of Setsubun.
小早川
I see... I wonder if we'll be scattering beans during this festival. I have a little brother now.
Ah, that's right. It must be tough for you to take the demon role.
My dad will play the demon. Why would you say that Rinko has to be the demon？
Why is that？ You give me that kind of impression, I guess...
Go away, you demon！ Hiya！
Ouch！！
It's almost that time of year again, huh？
小早川
What？
Come on！ There have been a lot of new chocolate commercials lately. It's that time of year▼
That's all about marketing, you know？ Why do we have to follow them？ We can have it our own way.
I see. I still prefer homemade chocolate anyway...
Eh？ ...But I think it's not bad that we support those commercial campaigns. Yeah.
(In other words, you're bad at making homemade chocolate, huh...？)
The most important thing is the feeling.
Say, it's almost that time of year again, huh？
小早川
No matter what, you still prefer homemade chocolate, right？
Eh！？ Ah... If you're bad at cooking, you don't have to overdo it...
Who said I'm bad at cooking！？ Did I say it？
No, you didn't.
If you think the feeling is most important, then I'll just buy it.
Yeah, yeah. The feeling is more important.
But you still prefer the homemade one, don't you！？
(What can I say to please her...？)
Say, it's almost that time of year again, huh？
小早川
Well... What is it again？
Hey！ It's February 14th.
Yeah, right. Well, will you be disappointed if I don't give you homemade chocolate？
Eh？ Well, maybe a little bit.
But you might also be disappointed with my homemade chocolate, you know.
I don't think so. The most important thing is your feeling.
Are you sure？ Can you swear？
(Somehow, I'm starting to become worried about this...)
It's almost Hinamatsuri. Does your family set up doll decorations, ▲小早川＊▲？
小早川
Speaking of which, they used to... until around the time I was in grade school.
Yeah. Usually, people only do that if they have small kids at home... Huh？
Rinko's dolls... It seems so pitiful to be put away. Maybe it's time to put them on decoration again.
(▲小早川＊▲ is so gentle when it comes to something like this.)
It's getting close...
小早川
March 14th, you mean？
Well, yeah.
Rinko tried pretty hard last month, right？
Well...
It's okay. The most important thing is the feeling. The feeling▼
(I think she's really looking forward to it... What should I do？)
It's been almost a month since Valentine's Day.
小早川
You wanted to say that the most important thing is the feeling？
...Eh？ Yeah！ The most important thing is to let you know my feelings！
Yeah, but it would be bad if I couldn't understand your feelings, right？
W-Well, that's right. Hahaha...
Hehehe...
(I think she's really looking forward to it... What should I do？)
By the way, it's been almost a month since Valentine's Day.
小早川
White Day is coming up▼
Yeah, that's true.
I tried my best with my homemade chocolate, right？
Yeah, that's right.
It's okay！ I won't ask you to do any handmade gift for me. Well, something that lasts long would be fine.
I see！ Yeah, nice idea. Something that lasts long！
Yeah. Like, forever▼
(I hope she isn't expecting a diamond or something like that...)
It's the cherry blossoms season again.
小早川
Did you just become sentimental？
Sort of. How about you, ▲小早川＊▲？ You don't feel sentimental？
It's not like I don't feel it... But speaking of cherry blossoms, there's that...
That...？
That dark, shaggy thing...
Ah, hairy caterpillar...？
Aaaah！ Noooo！ Don't say its name！ Now I'm picturing it！
(▲小早川＊▲ doesn't like hairy caterpillars then... Somehow this is unexpected.)
It's almost the golden week. ▲小早川＊▲, do you have any places you want to go to？
小早川
Hmm... Rinko wants to go to some places far away. The mountains would be great.
That's nice！ We probably can't go now, but maybe we can go for an overnight trip sometime later.
Pervert...
No... C-Can't I just dream about it！？
It's almost the sports festival. ▲小早川＊▲, will you participate in any event？
小早川
No. Actually, I plan to skip school on that day.
Hey, hey... I think you should participate.
No. No matter which event I join, I'll always lose.
But that will become one page in your youth memories, right？
In Rinko's book, such a disgraceful page shouldn't exist.
(...So she just doesn't want to lose, huh？)
By the way, we'll have to change our uniform soon.
小早川
Yeah, that's great. I like the summer uniform better. I'm not good with the heat...
Yeah, the summer uniform suits ▲小早川＊▲ better.
Don't look at me...
Why？
Because... you have those perverted eyes.
N-No, I'm not thinking about anything perverted！ Really.
小早川
It's July already...？ Do you think the sky will be clear on Tanabata？
Tanabata？ I don't know...
You don't know？ What an irresponsible answer... Yes or no？
My answer doesn't matter, right？ By the way, why did you ask me？
Why？ If it rains, Orihime and Hikoboshi won't be able to see each other. They can only meet once a year.
Oh my... Actually, ▲小早川＊▲ is so girlish, huh？
N-No...！ Everyone in Japan is concerned about this！
Not everyone！ Only the girls.
Shut up！
Ah！ Can't summer break come any sooner！？
小早川
Hah... It's good to be kids. They're so energetic.
What's with you...？ Ah, right. You don't like the heat, right？
What if I don't like it？
Come on... There are a lot of fun things to do, right？
Like what？
Sea bathing.
I hate swimsuits and it's hot.
Mountain hiking.
Insects will bite me and it's hot.
Then... Wait a moment.
Look！ Summer is bad. Summer is a bad season. That's all！
(Seems like I'll have a hard time asking her out in summer...)
It's sea bathing season soon.
小早川
Well, that's for small children.
You don't like it, huh？ Why？
Because I have to wear a swimsuit if I want to swim, right...？
Isn't that good？ Wearing a swimsuit.
That's just for those stupid kids who want to show off！
Don't be unreasonable... ▲小早川＊▲ would look good in a swimsuit.
You're lying. I know.
You will absolutely look good. I can guarantee that.
Really？
Really！ I really want to see ▲小早川＊▲ in a swimsuit.
...You look like a pervert. So, no.
(Hah, this is difficult！)
The fireworks season is coming soon... Speaking of fireworks, we can't forget about yukatas, right？
小早川
If you want to see me in a yukata, just say so.
Yeah！ And... will you wear it？
Let me tell you this. It's so hot in a yukata and it's very troublesome to put it on.
I see. But I still want to see ▲小早川＊▲ in a yukata.
Then ask me in a cute way.
Teehee！ Please wear a yukata▼
I'll think about it. ...Somehow, that was disgustingly cute.
(So, which is it...？ Anyway, I'm looking forward to see her in a yukata！)
Hah... Summer almost ends.
小早川
Isn't it good？ It's getting cooler▼
▲小早川＊▲ really hates summer, huh？ I wonder if we still have anything left undone.
No, none at all. Rinko will be with you in fall and winter, too. So don't feel down, okay？
But after summer ends, we'll have to go to school.
Can you stop talking about that？ Hah...
小早川
Hey, it's almost the harvest moon, right？
Yeah, I think so.
It feels strange to look at the moon.
Strange？
It looks too beautiful to be real, but in reality, humans have already walked on the moon.
I agree with you... ▲小早川＊▲, so you like the moon？
Yeah, I like it. I wonder if the sky will be clear enough for the moon to come out this year.
By the way, we have to change our uniforms soon.
小早川
Yeah, although the weather is still warm...
Right, ▲小早川＊▲ prefers the summer uniform, right？
It's much easier for the guys. You just put on a jacket and you're all done. This is sexual discrimination！
Now, now！ Anyway, it feels nice to see you in a winter uniform, ▲小早川＊▲.
Really？
Really.
Maybe I should bear with it since my boyfriend has a uniform fetish.
Fetish...？ Hey...
It's almost time for the culture festival. Is your class holding an event, ▲小早川＊▲？
小早川
We're discussing it.
Still discussing it？ But time is almost running out.
The students in my class aren't united. They all want to do their own thing.
I see. ▲小早川＊▲, what do you want to do then？
Rinko is a minimalist.
Mini... what？
I just want to do things in moderation, like play CDs in a classroom and make it a discotheque.
(That's too boring. Come on...)
Skiing season is coming up.
小早川
Yes！
Yes？ ▲小早川＊▲.
I'm very good at both skiing and snowboarding！ I've been practicing them since I was a kid.
Then you're looking forward to it, huh？
Right！ Curving Turn！ Yay！！
Ouch！！ Wasn't that a kick？
Christmas is coming soon...
小早川
We can see the decorations all over the town.
Yeah, even people who hate Christmas would still feel the atmosphere.
In the past, I used to feel irritated seeing couples enjoying the season, but...
This year, it will be others who will feel irritated seeing us.
Yeah, that's right.
Hehe...
(I'll have to make this year's Christmas a nice one for her.)
Christmas is coming soon...
小早川
What's so fun about Christmas？
▲小早川＊▲, don't you have fun？
I'm too old to believe in Santa Claus. I used to, until I was in grade school, I think.
I see.
But... Now that I'm growing up, I start to be looking forward to it again. I wonder why.
(I'll have to make this year's Christmas a nice one for her.)
Christmas is coming soon...
小早川
Yeah, that's right...
▲小早川＊▲, will you have a party at home？
Maybe. We'll have dinner at home or something. But...
I already told them that I'd go out with my friend and I'd probably be home late.
(I'll have to make this year's Christmas a nice one for her.)
It's almost the end of the year... A lot of things happened this year, huh？
小早川
Yeah... A lot of things.
▲小早川＊▲. What was the most memorable thing for you？
What was it？ Well, it's... You know it, right？
Our first date？
Our first kiss？
What is it？
It must be our first date, right？ It became the big news of the year.
Yeah... I had never imagined that I'd be dating someone. This is mysterious.
...Mysterious？
Yeah. We were strangers from different places and suddenly we are together like this, right？
(Yeah... I agree.)
It must be... our first kiss, right？
Yeah... That's right. My heart was throbbing but I felt so happy. That was the first time in my life.
Yeah... Me, too.
Just thinking about it makes my heart throb...
I think this feeling won't be gone for the rest of my life.
(I'll also remember it for the rest of my life.)
Huh？ What is it？
It's... Hey, geez. You knew it▼
Well... What was it？
Take this and you should know！
Ouch！
(I still don't know...)
It's the end of the year. Many things have happened, eh？
小早川
Yeah... Hey.
Huh？
If we can also be together like this next year, it'd be nice...
Yeah, that'd be nice.
And the year after that, too.
Yeah.
And years after that, we'll always be together, right？
(Yeah, that'd be nice.)
It's almost spring.
小早川
In spring, on the trees and on the roads, there will be a lot of them...
You mean... Ah, the hairy caterpillars...
No！
Don't say the name out loud... They'll appear.
No, I don't think so...
(▲小早川＊▲ really hates hairy caterpillar, huh？)
Hah... Spring is really nice. I feel relaxed.
小早川
"The spring sea keeps rising and falling, and rising and falling, all day long."
It's Matsuo Basho's haiku. He described the spring sea and the weather as "rising and falling."
As we could expect from an Edo period poet. It's great！ ...Anyway, what about the "all day long" part？
Well, it's like no matter how everything else goes, the sea will keep moving continuously, right？
Thus, rising and falling all day long, huh？
And if we keep playing and playing all day long and don't study, we'll be weeping and weeping all day long, too.
(That's true...)
By the way, the days are getting longer. I think summer is coming soon.
小早川
Hah... Summer again...？
▲小早川＊▲, you hate summer, huh？
I hate it. I hate everything about it.
At least there should be something that you like about it, right？
Hmm... Ah, potato chips！
I think it's the same in every season.
You just don't know. Potato chips made from fresh potatoes contain abundant Vitamin C. It's for limited time only.
So, that's what ▲小早川＊▲ is looking forward to in the summer...？
It's really hot. This is what summer is all about.
小早川
I want it to end soon...
▲小早川＊▲ really hates summer, huh？
I'm not very tall, so I'm closer to the ground and feeling more heat.
I don't think that's the case.
It really is. Ah！ Summer, go away！
(She hates it so much that she becomes unreasonable...)
The sky looks higher lately.
小早川
It's still hot but fall is coming soon.
What do you want to do in fall？
Well... Of course, I'll read books.
But you can read them all year long, right？
There will be more books coming out in fall.
Is that the reason？
That is the reason.
The days are getting shorter. It's already fall, huh？
小早川
It's getting cooler, too. So, it's absolutely fall now.
It's good, right？ Since ▲小早川＊▲ enjoys reading books in fall.
Yeah, I think I've been reading too many books that I'm lacking sleep.
Really！？ How many books have you read？
For this week... I've already read... 10 books.
Ten books！？ When did you read them？
Before I went to bed, during class break, and during class as well.
(▲小早川＊▲ always does things to the extreme, huh...？)
It's getting cold. Winter is coming soon.
小早川
During winter, when I go outside in the morning, it feels like my whole body becomes tightened.
Ah, in fact, when it's cold, you'll automatically curl yourself up. That'll make you look smaller.
Smaller？ ...Really？
No, I'm not really sure...
I'll have to try not to curl my body then.
It's the middle of winter now. How long will these cold days last？
小早川
Rinko likes it when it's cold.
Well, kids always enjoy winter...
...It would hurt badly to be kicked on a cold day.
I'm sorry. And I'm against violence...
